item.title: Niko add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Until a man is twenty-five, he still thinks, every so often, that under the right circumstances he could be the baddest motherfucker in the world. If I moved to a martial-arts monastery in China and studied real hard for ten years. If my family was wiped out by Colombian drug dealers and I swore myself to revenge. If I got a fatal disease, had one year to live, and devoted it to wiping out street crime. If I just dropped out and devoted my life to being bad." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Niko add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "3. There are bears and there are small dogs. Be strong like bear! If they take out your teeth, sit on the dogs. Bears always forget they can just sit on the dogs. Sit on the dogs." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Niko add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Everybody dies. What matters is what you do between now and when it happens to you." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Niko add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Niko add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "â€ŽLife is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats." -- Voltaire
